common.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to perform this action

auth.ACCOUNT_PENDING: Your account is still pending approval

auth.ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED: Account not verified. Please check your email for an OTP.

cart.ITEM_NOT_FOUND: The item doesn't exist in the Cart

review.MUST_BUY_FIRST: You can only review vendors after purchasing their products
review.ALREADY_REVIEWED: You have already reviewed this order

validation.IS_INT: Field {property} must be an integer number

validation.IS_EMAIL: Field {property} must be a valid email address
